Switching to Git (and GitHub)

28 Dec 2008 – Moy, Northern Ireland

Decided to finally make the move from svn to git for all my projects, and in the process am considering a move to GitHub, so we’ll see how this goes. Mikey Finn is sitting here playing COD World at War, so I’m doing this to a soundtrack of explosions and death.

Will probably spend a couple hours playing with Jekyll and if things look good, will start the migration of Geosack.
